kkubul0712@kkubul.kro.kr.subject: 전자 메일 주소 확인
kkubul0712@kkubul.kro.kr.text:
Microsoft 계정
전자 메일 주소 확인
Microsoft 계정 설정을 마치려면 귀하가 이 전자 메일 주소의 소유자인지 확인해야 합니다.
전자 메일 주소를 확인하려면 다음 보안 코드를 사용하세요. 9591
이 코드를 요청하지 않았다면 이 전자 메일을 무시해 주세요. 누군가 귀하의 전자 메일 주소를 잘못 입력한 것일 수 있습니다.
감사합니다.
Microsoft 계정 팀

Your one account for all things Microsoft.
 
Your Microsoft account is active and waiting
Access granted! With your Microsoft account, you can use our apps and services to maximize your day-to-day, anywhere. Plus, you can use your account dashboard to stay in control of family features, subscriptions, privacy settings and more.
VIEW YOUR ACCOUNT
Store smarter
Access your OneDrive cloud storage to seamlessly share photos and files anytime, anywhere—with anyone! 1,2
DOWNLOAD ONEDRIVE FREE
Presenting your mobile office
Clear your to-do list faster when you can use your favorite Microsoft apps anywhere. Now you have access to Office, Microsoft Edge, and more.1,2
Office Mobile App
Microsoft Edge
Office for the Web

test1234@kkubul.kro.kr.subject: Welcome!
test1234@kkubul.kro.kr.text:
View in browser
 
 
 
Hello! 👋
 
Thank you for signing up!
 
We built Indify because we wanted to help people do even more with Notion, and appreciate you coming with us on the ride – we are extremely proud to be a part of improving your Notion experience!
 
Curious how to use Indify? Check out our tutorial here.
 
We'd love to hear your ideas, answer your questions, incorporate as much feedback as we can into our roadmap, and host a place for you all to meet each other. Therefore, we created a Facebook Community as a space to collaborate – feel free to join!
 
In the meantime, feel free to follow us on Twitter to stay in touch.
 
Take care 🖤
 
— The Indify Team (Alex, James and Courtnie)
 
 
 
 
Want to change how you receive these emails?
You can unsusubscribe from this list.
 
 
© 2021 Indify.co
